-e ---

𒌅 ≈ 𒀸𒐺𒐺𒁹 ≈ 𒋰𒐺𒁹 ≈ 𒀜 ≈ 𒑙𒁹𒐺 ≈ 𒌈 𒋰𒐺 ≠ 𒄿 𒐺𒁹 ≠ 𒈠 ≠ 𒋗 šu

𒌅 •ST 𒊺 Š + T 𒀜 𒋫 𒋖 𒌅 ˢTUˡ TUʳ 𓏛 𓏮
𒌅 TU ⋍ 𒌈 TU₄ ⋍ 𒀜 AT "to" 𒑊 TU₂ ?
𒌅 -TU ⋍ 𒌈 -TUᵐ in Adjectives suffix -ty ty
𒌅 TU ≈ 𒌉 TUR in Proto-Cuneiform 𒌅 ṬUᵏ -ty -tum 𒀊𒁍𒌅 ab-bu-tu fatherhood
𒌅 TU 𓏏 -ta female suffix dame
𒌅 TU 𓏏 -dra female suffix vs 𒀭𒌅𒉿𒄴𒄩𒀸 Andro- "man, human"
𒌅 TU enter @ Tür
𒌅 TU ⇔ 𒀜 AT
𒌅 TU ⇔ ŠE 𒊺
𒌅 TU you 𓏏
𒌅 ≈ 𒀸𒐺𒐺𒁹 ≈ 𒋰𒋰𒐈 TA 𒋬
𒌅 ≈ 𒀸𒐺𒐺𒁹 ≈ 𒆳𒌆 TÚG 𒌅 TU ⋍ 𒌈 TU TUM
𒌅 #tud tracht trächtig √trag 𒌅 ṬUᵏ tuᵏ 𒌅 #tud 𒌅𒌓 tuᵏud τίκτω tíktō "to give birth (to), bear a child"

𒌅 -ⁿista -𓆇𓏏 female suffix 𒐀𒐼𒄿𒌅 assur-i-tu Astarte 𓏏𓆇
𒌅 TUʳ Tier шарык šaryk •ST устагӏ ustağ ≠ stag sau "sheep" <> 𒇻 UDU Widder 𒌅 TUʳ տերտեր terter "priest" 𒌅 •STU 𒊺𒉇 ŠE.TU₉ 𒋖 ŠITA @ 𓊨 𓏏 𓆱 <> páter "priest" 𒌅 •ST 𒊺𒀜/ 𒊺𒋫 𒊺𒋖 TA
𒌅 •ST/TS Č Z - 𒊺 Š + T 𒀜 AT 𒋫 TA 𒋖 Ṭь
𒀜 𒌅𒉡 To Thine: Ante Tu / To you
𒀜 𒌅𒉡 AT Thine: Ante Tu = and you ...
𒌅 TO… causative prefix

𒌅 tur₅ ≈ 𒌝 dih₂ دَاء dāʔ tehi teki@Toch. < die "disease" <> հիվանդություն doenza dolentia doleō ādl √*delh₁- Teil

T < Č < K in

𒌑𒁀𒇸𒌅 fenugreek

adjective marker 𒌅 -ty -que :

𒃻𒄣𒌅 šá-qu-tu sankt pure(ty)
𒃻𒊒𒄴𒌅 šá-ru-uḫ-tu splendid
𒁍𒂷𒌅 gít-mal-tu most perfect
𒍠 𒌅 zaq-tu zackig “pointed” 𐍃𐍄𐌹𐌺𐍃

noun suffix -𐍃 < Z Tˢ 𒌅 ˢTU ṬU ⋍ 𒌈 TUM 𒋾 TI tion

𒁾𒌅 ṭub-tu 𓊵 𓏏 𓊪 peace

𒍦𒁀𒌅 zib-baˢtu 𒆲 •cibastu 𓐍 𓃀 𓊃 𓏏 𓄢 Schwanz 𓐍 𓃀 𓋴 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓏥 tail #zibbatu 𒍦𒁀𒌅 zib-baⁿtˢ 𒆲 Schwanz 𓃟 ⇔ 𓋴 𓂧 𓄢 Sterz 𓄛 𓄜

𒌅𒁍 a reed

𒌓𒌅𒆪 calculating device, phps. abacus

𒌅𒄣𒌅 battle

⇔

𒌑𒁀𒇸𒌅 šam-ba-lil-tu şembelîlk “fenugreek”
𒊭𒁀𒇸𒌅 šabbaliltu שִׁבְּלִילְתָא šibbəlīləṯā ܫܒܠܝܠܬܐ šebbəlīltā شنبلیله šambalile @ Persia
𒊭𒄠𒁀𒇷𒅋𒌈 /šambaliltum/ şembelîkum balsamikum basilikum permutations of spices!
𒊭𒄠𒈬 𒁀𒅋𒌈 /šammu baliltu/ “fenugreek”, literally “mixture grass”
